text: The news of Hugh Hefner's death at the age of 91 has made many of us think of his legacy, not least of which was his groundbreaking — and often controversial — magazine, Playboy. But one area in Hef's wheelhouse that's often overlooked is the mark he left on reality television, specifically, the E! series ` ` The Girls Next Door.'' The TV series originally aired from 2005 until 2010, and was co - created by the Playboy founder.
